name: Speechless
content: We know we won't be together
我们知道我们不会在一起
Is just a matter of time
With all the truth from heart
And we broke it from start
No matter how we tried and tried
它就在我们的内心深处
We might as well just let
Let it die and say goodbye
让它死去 然后说再见
也许有一天我们会意识到
Love can be hurtful still oooh
We all make mistakes and never regret
我们都会犯错误 还从不会后悔
We know we won't be together
我们知道我们不会在一起
Is just a matter of time
With all the truth from heart
And we broke it from start
它就在我们的内心深处
We might as well just let
Let it die and say goodbye
让它死去 然后说再见
也许有一天我们会意识到
